document.title: Oops, I did it
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Order Confirmation Receipt Thank You. Your order has been processed successfully. We have just sent you an email to confirm the details of this transaction. For a printable receipt, click on the order number below. Order Number: 14772XXX We will notify you via email once your order has been shipped. Return to Site
Edit 17h38 : Je suis assailli par le doute, je me demande si je n'aurais pas du craquer pour ce modele [via Tristan ]
